snippet.title: Monster Train 2 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Monster Train returns with all new clans, new enemy factions, new challenges, new modes and more! Defend your Pyre in the classic three-tiered, vertical gameplay that made the original roguelike deckbuilder a hit.

Monster Train 2 is coming soon to PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

Play the PC Demo, live now on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2742830/Monster_Train_2/

More info:
https://www.bigfangames.com/games/monster-train-2

Developed by Shiny Shoe. Published by Big Fan Games.
